select count(*) from U where U_STATUS != '탈퇴됨'
AND U_PRIVACY = 'O'
AND ( U_ID LIKE '%'||#{id}||'%' OR U_NAME LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' OR U_GRADE LIKE '%'||#{grade}||'%' )

SELECT U_ID AS "id", U_NAME AS "name", U_GRADE AS "grade", U_REGDATE AS "regdate", U_PRIVACY AS "privacy", U_STATUS AS "status", U_RECOMMENDS AS "recommends", U_VIEWS AS "views" FROM ( SELECT (RANK() OVER(ORDER BY U_RECOMMENDS DESC,U_VIEWS DESC,U_REGDATE DESC))ROWNUMS, USERLIST.* FROM USERLIST WHERE U_STATUS != '탈퇴됨'
AND U_PRIVACY = 'O'
AND ( U_ID LIKE '%'||#{id}||'%' OR U_NAME LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' OR U_GRADE LIKE '%'||#{grade}||'%' )
ORDER BY U_RECOMMENDS DESC,U_VIEWS DESC,U_REGDATE DESC)
WHERE ROWNUMS > ((#{page}-1)*#{amount}) and ROWNUMS <= (#{page}*#{amount})
select count(*) from USERS WHERE U_ID=#{id}
select count(*) from USERS WHERE U_ID=#{id} AND U_PW=#{pw}

UPDATE U SET
U_NAME = #{name},
U_PW = #{pw},
U_MAIL = #{mail},
U_PHONE = #{phone},
U_BIRTH = #{birth},
U_PRIVACY = #{privacy},
U_STATUS = #{status},
U_ID = U_ID where U_ID=#{id}

select U_ID AS "id", U_NAME AS "name", U_GENDER AS "gender", U_GRADE as "grade", U_PW AS "pw" , U_MAIL AS "mail", U_PHONE AS "phone", U_ADDRESS AS "address", U_COMPANY AS "company", U_BIRTH AS "birth", U_TEL AS "tel", U_PRIVACY AS "privacy", U_STATUS AS "status" from USERS WHERE U_ID=#{id}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT UH_DATE as "date", UH_IP as "ip",UH_STATUS as "login_status" FROM UH WHERE UH_UID=#{id} ORDER BY UH_DATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM<11
SELECT UH_UID as "id", MAX(UH_DATE) as "date" FROM UH WHERE UH_UID=#{id} GROUP BY UH_UID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SC (SC_UID, SC_NAME, SC_CONTENTS, SC_NO, SC_START, SC_END, SC_COLOR) VALUES(#{id},#{name},#{contents},S_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{start},#{end},#{color})
mapper.update: UPDATE SC SET SC_NAME = #{name}, SC_CONTENTS = #{contents} WHERE SC_UID = #{id} AND SC_START = #{start} AND SC_END = #{end} AND SC_COLOR = #{color}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SC WHERE SC_UID = #{id} AND SC_START = #{start} AND SC_END = #{end} AND SC_COLOR = #{color}
mapper.select: select * from (select SC_UID AS "id", SC_NAME AS "name", SC_CONTENTS AS "contents", SC_NO AS "no", SC_START AS "start", SC_END AS "end", SC_COLOR AS "color" from sc where SC_UID = #{id} order by SC_START,SC_END) where rownum=1
select SC_UID AS "id", SC_NAME AS "name", SC_CONTENTS AS "contents", SC_NO AS "no", SC_START AS "start", SC_END AS "end", SC_COLOR AS "color" from sc where SC_UID = #{id} order by SC_START,SC_END
